snippet: Brahms’s “German Requiem,” performed by the St. Thomas Choir of Men and Boys, was dedicated to the victims of Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by St Thomas Choir of Men and Boys at St Thomas Church.
